017package org.apache.commons.lang3.concurrent;
018
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.function.FailableFunction;
020
021/**
022 * Definition of an interface for a wrapper around a calculation that takes a single parameter and returns a result.
023 *
024 * <p>This interface allows for wrapping a calculation into a class so that it maybe passed around an application.</p>
025 *
026 * <p>See also {@code FailableFunction<I, O, InterruptedException>}.</p>
027 *
028 * @param <I> the type of the input to the calculation
029 * @param <O> the type of the output of the calculation
030 * @see FailableFunction
031 * @since 3.6
032 */
033public interface Computable<I, O> {
034
035    /**
036     * This method carries out the given operation with the provided argument.
037     *
038     * @param arg
039     *            the argument for the calculation
040     * @return the result of the calculation
041     * @throws InterruptedException
042     *             thrown if the calculation is interrupted
043     */
044    O compute(I arg) throws InterruptedException;
045}
